ecoware.ecowareaccessmanager

Class ECoWareMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecoware.ecowareaccessmanager.ECoWareMessageSender

  • public class ECoWareMessageSender
extends Object
    Author:
    Armando Varriale

    This class represent a ECoWare sender that is an entity able to connect to the (ECoWare) message bus and to publish (send) messages on the bus. The sender has a pubblication ID and thus the submitted messages have this publication ID, which is used by receivers (ECoWareMessageReceiver) to retrieve specific needed messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new ECoWareMessageSender with the specified host name and publishing key (ID).
